es.wrong_recipe_selected: ¡Oops! Casi, pero elegiste la receta equivocada.
es.wrong_ingredientes_collected: ¡Oops! No todos los ingredientes fueron correctos.

en.wrong_recipe_selected: Oops! Almost, but you chose the wrong recipe.
en.wrong_ingredientes_collected: Oops! Not all ingredients were correct.
en.right_recipe_and_ingredientes_collected: Well done! You prepared the recipe correctly.
en.gravitational_recipe: Awesome! You caught a gravitational ingredient.

fr.wrong_recipe_selected: Oups! Presque, mais tu as choisi la mauvaise recette.
fr.wrong_ingredientes_collected: Oups! Tous les ingrédients n’étaient pas corrects.
fr.right_recipe_and_ingredientes_collected: Bien joué ! Tu as préparé la recette correctement.
fr.gravitational_recipe: Génial! Tu as attrapé un ingrédient gravitationnel.
